content.text:
# Draft:2021 Valley City State Vikings football team

The 2021 Valley City State Vikings football team represented Valley City State University in the 2021 NAIA football season as a member of the North Star Athletic Association (NSAA).
Led by 28th-year head coach Dennis McCulloch, the Vikings played their home games at Lokken Stadium in Valley City, North Dakota.
The Vikings finished the season with an overall record of 8–2 and 6–2 in NSAA play, placing second in the conference.
The season featured a 6–0 start and key wins over Jamestown, Mayville State, and Waldorf.
Two Vikings earned NAIA All-America Honorable Mention recognition, and several players were selected to the NSAA All-Conference Team.
The team also received votes in the 2021 NAIA Coaches’ Poll late in the season.

* Dennis McCulloch – Head Coach (28th season)

* Dave Rausch – Linebackers (35th season)
* Alex Kretzschmar – Quarterbacks/Wide Receivers (1st season)
* Trent Kosel – Tight Ends (1st season)
* Dalvin Simmons – Graduate Assistant / Defensive Line (1st season)
* Alec Brown – Graduate Assistant / Tight Ends (1st season)
